transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji mam boliye.
Executive: Sir, greeting Jyoti baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji mam boliye.
Executive: Sir aapka na issue raise hua tha IndiaMART pe sir.
Customer: Wo mam abhi abhi mam ye ho gaya hai mam ye solve. Abhi IndiaMART ke through bhi abhi call to unhone mail mera update karwa diya hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir aur dusra sir aapko ye batana tha bhi jaise na kuch time se leads vagera bhi aap consume nahi kar rahe hain to matlab koi person hai sir ya kisi ko guide karna hai sir.
Customer: Mam main hi use karta hu mam abhi filhal mam abhi hum log ka production dusre cheez ka ho raha tha isliye mam idhar IndiaMART pe dhyan nahi diya gaya tha.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Ji mam abhi sir mam call to lekin mam call to hum log continue kar rahe hain lekin leads yahan se consume nahi ho pa raha hai sir. Call to hum log attend karte hi hai.
Executive: Lead to sir bilkul bhi consume nahi ho pa rahi hai sir.
Customer: Last three months se humko lag raha hai nahi ho raha hoga three ya two months se nahi ho raha hoga.
Executive: Last 90 days mein sirf two days aapne lead consume kiya tha sir September mein do din aapne lead consume kiya tha October November to bilkul zero activation hai sir buyleads pe. Aur agar buyleads aap nahi consume karte ho sir thoda visibility pe bhi rehta hai aur inquiries and calls bhi thoda drop ho jata hai aapne dekha hoga sir 60 tak 70 70 calls aapke pass jati thi. Abhi November mein itni.
Customer: Ji abhi mam nahi abhi mam nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Hai na listing suppress ho jati hai upar se email id bhi aapka itne time se bounce pada hua tha.
Customer: Ji mam wo usi wajah se mam thoda dikkat ho raha tha kyuki sir bahar chale gaye the jinka email tha wo bahar chale gaye the out of India to is wajah se nahi ho pa raha tha contact.
Executive: Theek hai to abhi ha ab mam ho gaya hai to ab mam ye continue rahega.
Executive: Aur ye aap sir all India mein deal karte hain?
Customer: Nahi mam.
Executive: Specific area mein to jahan pe service aap provide karate ho kahan kahan pe sir.
Customer: Ji mam paanch se cheh state hai mam.
Executive: Theek hai aur ye meri naam jaan sakte ho jinse baat ho rahi hai Priya Anand Anand Anand acha acha to yahan pe aap matlab service handle karte hain sir.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Okay isme na sir dekho kafi sari products bhi hain jaise main dekh pa rahi thi jyadatar thoda bahut aapne jo bhi lead consume kiye hain ye aapne corn silage mein kiya tha sir.
Customer: Ji mam baki jaise main main jo hai mam hum log ka mam corn silage ka hi hai abhi mam filhal mam hum log naya naya product add kar rahe hain to fir usko bhi mam focus karenge. Abhi to do product mam maine add kiya hai.
Executive: Kuch matlab naye product launch kare aapne kuch matlab dusre product pe kaam kar rahe ho abhi.
Customer: Wo maize DDG jo product hai wo maine ek add kiya hai isme mam unka mam main marketing karta hu to wahi mam add kiya usme.
Executive: Aur abhi jo hamare pass mein ha already jo products jitne sare added hai to wo sab mein service provide kara rahe ho abhi sir ya isme se kuch aise product hai jo aapne matlab discontinue kar diye.
Customer: Ji ji ji nahi nahi nahi mam sara continue hai mam.
Executive: Ah okay to aap jaise bata rahe hain na sir paanch se cheh state mein hi agar aap deal kar rahe ho to aap thoda preferred locations to tab bhi aapki hongi na sir sir jab wahan se aap lead consume karoge abhi to aap location mein kuch bhi show nahi kar rahe hain sir.
Customer: Local Bihar to mam hum log ka to.
Executive: Nahi wo aap karte ho sir abhi actually kya hota hai na jaise aapne bataya ki aapka major product hai aur locations mein bhi aapka paanch se cheh state hai jahan pe aap deal karte ho.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai but usme sir ye hum log ka jo hai West Bengal hai Bihar hai Uttar Pradesh hai Assam hai mam.
Executive: To yahan pe na sir ye jo jo locations hai na buyleads mein jaise aap jante ho to aap na location wise filter laga laga ke apna preferred district ka theek hai to wahan se aap lead consume karo jaise jaise aap lead consume karoge sir to wo locations aapke preference mein add on ho jayega then wahan se fir aapke pass mein auto reflect karegi buyleads.
Executive: Similarly aap daily agar aap aapka to jo service chal raha hai sir isme aapko jo leads allocate hoti hai wo aapko daily ka four aur weekly 10 buyleads allocate hoti hai sir to aapko sirf do se teen buyleads consume karni rehti hai.
Executive: Theek hai to aapka jo ha uske product mein similarly aap buylead consume karo theek hai aur location jaise maine bataya aapko search kar karke aap consume karo aapka preference bhi create hoga fir aapko auto reflect buylead bhi wahan show karenge aur inquiries and calls ka ratio bhi increase hoga sir.
Executive: Abhi overall kaisa kuch business generate ho raha hai sir IndiaMART se?
Customer: Mam response to mam acha mil raha hai IndiaMART ke through jab hum log ka mam production rehta hai tabhi to hum log ko bahut jyada helpful milta hai. Acha.
Customer: Har ek mahine hum log mam nahi kuch to mam char paanch to mam lead matlab complete convert ho jata hai hum log ka. Okay IndiaMART ke through aur jo hum log ko local jo lete hain wo to mera continue chalta hi hai.
Executive: Sir aap socho sir ye to IndiaMART ka best plan hai jo aap use kar rahe ho even then other services bhi hai hamare pass mein aap chaho to uske liye bhi plan kar sakte ho usme aapko response aur acha milega agar aapka production abhi start ho chuka hai na.
Customer: Nahi mam abhi nahi hua hai mam abhi mam dusre production un dusre product ka production chal raha hai mam.
Executive: Okay iska mam March iska mam March se leke matlab September tak hi chalta hai mam production corn silage ka. Acha.
Executive: Okay isme sir jo bhi client se baat hoti hai discussion hota hai aap unko ratings ke liye bhi bolo buyer ko na. Profile pe post bhi karta hai sir jitne jyada rating and reviews rahenge sir.
Customer: Theek hai mam is cheez pe mam dhyan deta hu mam.
Executive: Theek hai baki main yahan se aapka jo concern hai wo abhi close kar rahi hu aur koi bhi issue aata hai regarding services aap beshak for directly bhi reach out kar sakte ho sir.
Customer: Okay mam.
Executive: Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was not consuming buyleads.

- Customer's email ID was bouncing.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the benefits of consuming buyleads.

- Executive explained how to filter location-wise buyleads.

- Executive closed the customer's concern.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, location, product
